subject: Re: [junit] Hi, just curious about Junit....newbie

messageBody:
jonghwanyang wrote:

>Hi, I was wondering in what way was the Java Reflection library
>important for the creation of JUnit. Thanks...
>
>

Look for the word "reflection" in
"JUnit: a Cook's Tour."
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm

Actually, you should read the whole stuff. It's very interesting.

Alain Ravet
